verses.verse: I will <S%H7311>extol<s%> <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, for you have raised me <S%H1802>up,<s%> and have not made my <S%H341>foes<s%> to rejoice over <S%H8055>me.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> I <S%H7768>cried<s%> to <S%H7495>you,<s%> and you have healed me.
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you have brought <S%H5927>up<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%> You have kept me <S%H2421>alive,<s%> that I should not go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%>
<S%H2167>Sing<s%> praise to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you <S%H2623>saints<s%> of <S%H3034>his.<s%> Give thanks to his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2143>name.<s%>

For his <S%H639>anger<s%> is but for a <S%H7281>moment.<s%> His <S%H7522>favor<s%> is for a <S%H2416>lifetime.<s%> <S%H1065>Weeping<s%> may <S%H3885>stay<s%> for the <S%H6153>night,<s%> but <S%H7440>joy<s%> comes in the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>
As for <S%H559>me,<s%> I said in my <S%H7959>prosperity,<s%> "I shall <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>"

<S%H3068>You,<s%> Yahweh, when you <S%H7522>favored<s%> <S%H2042>me,<s%> made my mountain <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5797>strong;<s%> but when you <S%H5641>hid<s%> your <S%H6440>face,<s%> I was <S%H926>troubled.<s%>
I <S%H7121>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh. To <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> I made <S%H2603>supplication:<s%>

"What <S%H1215>profit<s%> is there in my <S%H1818>destruction,<s%> if I go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit?<s%> Shall the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H5046>you?<s%> Shall it declare your <S%H571>truth?<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on <S%H3068>me.<s%> Yahweh, be my <S%H5826>helper.<s%>"
You have <S%H2015>turned<s%> my <S%H4553>mourning<s%> into <S%H4234>dancing<s%> for <S%H6605>me.<s%> You have removed my <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H247>clothed<s%> me with <S%H8057>gladness,<s%>

To the end that my <S%H3519>heart<s%> may <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise to <S%H1826>you,<s%> and not be silent. <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to you <S%H5769>forever!<s%>
